00010 Rioter::Rioter(GameWorld* world, ngl::Obj *_mesh) : Agent(world)
00011 {
00012     m_entityType = typeRioter;
00013     //m_gameworld = world;
00014 
00015     // Set up LUA state
00016     luaL_dofile(L, "lua/Rioter.lua");
00017     luaL_openlibs(L);
00018 
00019   // Set up LUA state
00020   luaL_dofile(L, "lua/Rioter.lua");
00021   luaL_openlibs(L);
00022 
00023   registerClass(L);
00024   luabridge::push(L, this);
00025   lua_setglobal(L, "rioter");
00026 
00027   // Set up state machine
00028   m_stateMachine = new StateMachine<Rioter>(this);
00029 
00030   // Set initial variables
00031   m_mesh = _mesh;
00032 
00033   m_hopHeight = 0.5;
00034   m_hopSpeed = 0.0;
00035   luabridge::LuaRef makeRioter = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "makeRioter");
00036   makeRioter();
00037 
00038   Vehicle::Steering()->WallAvoidOn();
00039   Vehicle::Steering()->setWallAvoidWeight(0.4);
00040   Vehicle::Steering()->ObstacleAvoidOn();
00041 
00042   m_policeInfluence = 0.0;
00043 
00044   m_protestPos = ngl::Vec3(0,0,0);
00045 }

00056 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 void Rioter::update(double timeElapsed, double currentTime)
00058 {
00059   Vehicle::Steering()->clearFriendlyNeighbours();
00060   Vehicle::Steering()->clearAllNeighbours();
00061   Vehicle::Steering()->addFriendlyNeighbours(getNeighbourRioterIDs());
00062   Vehicle::Steering()->addAllNeighbours(getNeighbourRioterIDs());
00063   Vehicle::Steering()->addAllNeighbours(getNeighbourPoliceIDs());
00064 
00065   Vehicle::Steering()->WallOverlapAvoidance();
00066   Vehicle::Steering()->ObjectOverlapAvoidance();
00067 
00068   Agent::update(timeElapsed, currentTime);
00069   m_stateMachine->update();
00070 
00071   // calculate influence of neighbouring police based on their rage
00072   int nearbyPolice = m_neighbourPoliceIDs.size();
00073   m_policeInfluence = 0.0;
00074 
00075   for (int i=0; i<nearbyPolice; i++)
00076   {
00077     Agent* policeman = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_neighbourPoliceIDs[i]));
00078     if (policeman)
00079     {
00080       m_policeInfluence += policeman->getRage();
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084   m_hopSpeed = m_rage/5.0;
00085   m_hop = (sin((currentTime*m_hopSpeed)+m_ID)*sin((currentTime*m_hopSpeed)+m_ID)*m_hopHeight);
00086 }

00090 {
00091   loadMatricesToShader(cam, mouseGlobalTX);
00092   m_mesh->draw();
00093 }

00095 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void Rioter::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00097 {
00098   ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00099   m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00100   m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(1.0f-(1-(getHealth()/100.0f)), 1.0f-(getRage()/100.0f)-(1-(getHealth()/100.0f)), 1.0f-(getRage()/100.0f)-(1-(getHealth()/100.0f)), 1.0f));
00101 
00102   m.loadToShader("material");
00103 
00104   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00105 
00106   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00107   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00108   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00109   ngl::Mat4 M;
00110   ngl::Transformation trans;
00111   trans.setPosition(getPos().m_x,m_hop,getPos().m_z);
00112 
00113   ngl::Real rot = atan(getHeading().m_z/getHeading().m_x);
00114 
00115 
00116   rot = ((rot * 180)/M_PI);
00117 
00118   if(getHeading().m_x < 0)
00119   {
00120     rot = 180 + rot;
00121   }
00122 
00123   if(m_health <= 20.f)
00124   {
00125     trans.addPosition(0,0.3,0);
00126     trans.setRotation(90,-rot+90,0);
00127   }
00128   else
00129   {
00130     trans.setRotation(0,-rot+90,0);
00131   }
00132 
00133 
00134   M=trans.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00135   MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00136   MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00137   normalMatrix=MV;
00138   normalMatrix.inverse();
00139   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MV",MV);
00140   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00141   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00142   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("M",M);
00143 }

00147 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 void Rioter::findTargetID(float _health)
00149 {
00150   std::vector<int> police = getNeighbourPoliceIDs();
00151   float currentHealth = -1;
00152   Agent* currentTarget = NULL;
00153   for (int i=0; i<police.size(); i++)
00154   {
00155     Agent* policeman = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(police[i]));
00156     if (policeman)
00157     {
00158       if (policeman->getHealth()> _health && policeman->getHealth()>currentHealth)
00159       {
00160         currentHealth = policeman->getHealth();
00161         currentTarget = policeman;
00162       }
00163     }
00164   }
00165 
00166   if (currentTarget == NULL)
00167   {
00168     setTargetID(-1);
00169   }
00170   else
00171   {
00172     int target = currentTarget->getID();
00173     setTargetID(target);
00174   }
00175 }

00177 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 bool Rioter::handleMessage(const Message& _message)
00179 {
00180   switch(_message.m_message)
00181   {
00182   case msgRioterDeath:
00183     m_morale -= 5.f;
00184     m_rage += 30.f;
00185     return true;
00186     break;
00187   case msgPoliceDeath:
00188     m_morale -= 15.f;
00189     break;
00190   case msgAttack:
00191     return Agent::handleMessage(_message);
00192     break;
00193   default:
00194     std::cout<<"Rioter: Message type not defined"<<std::endl;
00195     return false;
00196     break;
00197   }
00198 }

00200 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00201 void Rioter::attack()
00202 {
00203   m_messageMgr->sendMessage(this->getID(), this->getTargetID(), msgAttack, m_damage);
00204 }

00206 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 void Rioter::death()
00208 {
00209   for (int i = 0; i < m_world->getNumberOfRioters(); i++)
00210   {
00211     ngl::Vec3 vecToRioter = m_world->getRioters()[i]->getPos() - m_pos;
00212     double distSqToRioter = vecToRioter.lengthSquared();
00213     double affectedRadius = 8.0;
00214     if (distSqToRioter < affectedRadius * affectedRadius)
00215     {
00216       m_messageMgr->sendMessage(this->getID(), m_world->getRioters()[i]->getID(), msgRioterDeath, 0.f);
00217     }
00218   }
00219 }

00223 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 void Rioter::protestCohesion(double weight)
00225 {
00226   if(weight <= 0.0)
00227   {
00228     Vehicle::Steering()->SquadCohesionOff();
00229   }
00230   else
00231   {
00232     Vehicle::setSquadCrosshair(m_protestPos);
00233     Vehicle::Steering()->setSquadCohesionWeight(weight);
00234     Vehicle::Steering()->SquadCohesionOn();
00235   }
00236 }

00241 void Rioter::findPathHome()
00242 {
00243   m_homePos = findNearestExit(m_world->getCellGraph()->getExitPoints());
00244   findPath(m_homePos);
00245   m_hasPathHome = true;
00246 }

00251 void Rioter::registerClass(lua_State* _L)
00252 {
00253   registerLua(_L);
00254   luabridge::getGlobalNamespace(_L)
00255     .deriveClass<Rioter, Agent>("Rioter")
00256       .addConstructor <void (*) (GameWorld*, ngl::Obj*)> ()
00257         .addFunction("attack", &Rioter::attack)
00258         .addFunction("death", &Rioter::death)
00259         .addFunction("protestCohesion", &Rioter::protestCohesion)
00260         .addFunction("getPoliceInfluence", &Rioter::getPoliceInfluence)
00261         .addFunction("findPathHome", &Rioter::findPathHome)
00262     .endClass();
